Verses: 1 peththuvelin Kumaaranaagiya Yovelukku Undaana Karththarudaiya Vasanam.
2 mudhiyore, Idhaik Kelungal; Dhesaththin Sagala Kudigale, Sevikodungal; Ungal Naatkalilaavadhu Ungal Pidhaakkalin Naatkalilaavadhu Ippadippattadhu Sambaviththadhundaa?
3 idhin Seydhiyai Ungal Pillaigalukkuth Theriviyungal; Idhai Ungal Pillaigal Thangal Pillaigalukkum, Avargal Thangal Pillaigalukkum Sandhadhiyaarukkum Therivikkakkadavargal.
4 pachchaippuzhu Vittadhai Vettukkili Thindradhu; Vettukkili Vittadhaip Pachchaikkili Thindradhu; Pachchaikkili Vittadhai Musukkattaippoochchi Thindradhu.
5 veriyare, Vizhiththu Ezhungal; Dhraatcharasam Kudikkira Sagala Janangale, Pudhu Dhraatcharasaththinimiththam Alarungal; Adhu Ungal Vaayinindru Vilakkappattadhu.
6 ennimudiyaadha Oru Balaththa Jaadhi Un Dhesaththinmel Varugiradhu; Adhin Parkal Singaththin Parkal; Dhushta Singaththin Kadaivaaipparkal Adharku Undu.
7 en Dhraatchachchediyai Azhiththu, En Aththimaraththai Uriththu, Adhin Pattaiyai Mutrilum Thindrupottadhu; Adhin Kilaigal Venmaiyaayitru.
8 than Paaliyavayadhin Purushanukkaaga Rattuduththiyirukkira Pennaippolap Pulambu.
9 pojanapaliyum Paanapaliyum Karththarudaiya Aalayaththai Vittu Atruppoyina; Karththarin Oozhiyakkaararaagiya Aasaariyargal Dhukkikkiraargal.
10 vayalveli Paazhaayitru, Boomi Dhukkankondaadugiradhu; Vilaichchal Azhikkappattadhu; Pudhu Dhraatcharasam Vatrippoyitru; Enney Maandupoyitru.
11 payiridun Kudigale, Vetkappadungal; Kodhumaiyum Vaarkodhumaiyum Illaamarpoyitru; Dhraatchaththottakkaarare, Alarungal; Vayalveliyin Aruppu Azhindhupoyitru.
12 dhraatchachchedi Vadhangi, Aththimaram Saaramatruppogiradhu; Maadhalai, Pereechcham, Kichchili Mudhaliya Veliyin Chedigal Ellaam Vaadippoyina; Sandhosham Manupuththiraraivittu Ozhindhupoyitru

13 aasaariyargale, Rattuduththip Pulambungal; Palipeedaththin Panividaikkaarare, Alarungal; En Dhevanudaiya Thondare, Neengal Ulle Pravesiththu Rattuduththavargalaai Raaththangungal. Ungal Dhevanudaiya Aalayaththil Pojanapaliyum Paanapaliyum Seluththappadaamal Niruththappattadhu.

14 parisuththa Ubavaasanaalai Niyamiyungal; Viseshiththa Aasarippaik Koorungal; Moopparaiyum Dhesaththin Ellaakkudigalaiyum Ungal Dhevanaagiya Karththarin Aalayaththile Koodivarachcheydhu Karththarai Nokkik Kooppidungal.
15 andha Naalinimiththam Aiyo! Karththarudaiya Naal Sameebamaayirukkiradhu; Adhu Sangaarampola Sarvavallavaridaththilirundhu Varugiradhu.
16 nammudaiya Kangalaivittu Aagaaramum, Nammudaiya Dhevanin Aalayaththaivittu Sandhoshamum, Magizhchchiyum Neekkappadavillaiyo?
17 vidhaiyaanadhu Mankattigalinkeezh Makkippoyitru; Payir Theeyndhupogiradhinaal Pandasaalaigal Paazhaagik Kalanjiyangal Idindhupoyina.
18 mirugangal Evvalavaaith Thavikkiradhu; Maattumandhaigal Thangalukku Meychchal Illaadhadhinaal Kalangugiradhu; Aattu Mandhaigalum Sedhamaaippoyitru.
19 karththaave, Ummai Nokkik Kooppidugiren; Akkini Vanaandharaththin Meychchalgalaip Patchiththu, Juvaalai Veliyin Virutchangalaiyellaam Eriththuppodugiradhu.
20 veliyin Mirugangalum Ummai Nokkik Kadharugiradhu; Nadhigalil Thanneerellaam Vatrippoyitru; Akkini Vanaandharaththin Meychchalgalaip Patchiththuppottadhu.
